resources.string:
Get ready to embark in a wild adventure that will span the vast infinity of space.

You will be trading all kinds of goods to all kinds of wacky individuals across the cosmos.
 By taking advantage of supply and demand differences between solar systems you have the opportunity to amass a fortune over time and become an interplanetary multibillionaire. 
 Amass a fortune and retire to the moon!
How many would you like to buy?
